showTemperatureAndHumidity.title: Show Water Sensor Temperature and Humidity in HomeKit
showTemperatureAndHumidity.description: Display Water Sensor(s) area temperature and humidity in HomeKit.

enableValveControl.title: Enable Valve Control in HomeKit
enableValveControl.description: Enable or disable Smart Water Shutoff within HomeKit.

showHealthTestSwitch.title: Run Health Test from HomeKit
showHealthTestSwitch.description: Display a Health Test switch button to start a manual Health Test in Flo.

showAuxSwitch.title: Create a switch for turn on/off water shutoff
showAuxSwitch.description: Display am auxiliary water shutoff switch, useful in automations.

treatWarningAsCritical.title: Treat Warning as Critical Events
treatWarningAsCritical.description: This option allows Warning to be treated as Critical events thus trigging the alarm.

surpressWaterNotification.title: Auto clear Leak detection
surpressWaterNotification.description: By default the leak event remain active until it is clear within the flo system, this option allows the plug-in to auto clear when water is no longer detected.

deviceRefresh.title: Device Refresh Interval (seconds)
deviceRefresh.description: Poll interval to obtain device updates in seconds. Please note: A very low value may cause lockout to your account and/or API errors.

pingRefresh.title: Periodically Force Refresh
pingRefresh.description: Force a cloud refresh of devices at a regular interval. This option should only be used if devices do not seems to updates for multiple hours.

offlineTimeLimit.title: Offline Time Limit (hours)
offlineTimeLimit.description: Number of house with no refresh before considering device offline.

sleepRevertMinutes.title: Sleep Time
sleepRevertMinutes.description: Sleep Mode is a system mode that quiets all monitoring and alerting, effectively putting the Flo System to sleep. This value represents the length of time to place the system in sleep mode.

retryErrorDisplay.title: Maximum number of refresh error before alerting in log.
retryErrorDisplay.description: At times the plug-in reports a 502 error. This is a communication error with the Flo server. An occasional error will not effect operations but can fill up log. This value define number of consecutive failure before logging.

showFloTemperature.title: Show the temperature of Flo value.

showGPMPSIasLight.title: Show the current Gallons Per Minute (GPM) and Water Pressure (PSI) value as lux sensors.

items.description: Disabled the storage of Flo access token to local Homebridge server. Refresh token at start-up.

items.title: Excluded Devices
items.description: A list of devices to exclude from HomeKit. Users device serial number which can be found in the Flo app.
